definition: long illness makes the patient into a good doctor (idiom)

sentences.english: Nature, time and patience are the three great physicians.
sentences.chinese: 自然，时间和耐心是三大良医。

sentences.english: She is attended by a good doctor.
Kinship is healing , we are physicians to each other .
sentences.chinese: 亲情使是我们彼此疗疾慰苦的良医。

sentences.english: Not even the best doctor in the country could cure her.
sentences.chinese: 大家都无计可施，全国最好的良医也没办法救她的病。

definition: practice medicine or pharmacy to help the people or public
benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
to treat the disease to save the patient/to criticize a person in order to help him
magical hands bring the dying back to life (idiom); miracle cure/brilliant doctor
to practice medicine (esp. in private practice)
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
Hua Tuo (?-208), famous doctor at the end of Han Dynasty
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
